title: Anyone Know This Font?
content:
Normally I'm pretty good at Identifying fonts and know quite a few by name but this one stumped me and it's a shame because I used to have it :) Appreciate anyone that even attempts to help!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12_1.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [12.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224451/http:/typophile.com/files/12_1.png) | 8.44 KB |
author: tcs728

comments.content: :\ can't find that font on dafont..

Consider it a blessing in disguise! :-)

hhp

Dafont doesn't have it because its a commercial font. For other fonts more or less in the style of Earth you can check out fonts by [Daniel Zadorozny [Iconian Fonts]](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224451/http:/www.dafont.com/iconian-fonts.d6?page=1) as shown at Dafont.  
Don
